org.genepattern.matrix
Interface ClassVector

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultClassVector
public interface ClassVector

An interface for nominal class information.

Method Summary
 int getAssignment(int index)
          Gets the class assignment.
 int getClassCount()
          Gets the number of different possible values taken by the class assignments.

          Gets the class name for the specified assignment.
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Gets the description for this class vector.

          Gets the number of assignments in this class vector.

Parameters:

Returns:

getClassName

java.lang.String getClassName(int assignment)
Gets the class name for the specified assignment.

Parameters:
assignment - The assignment.
Returns:
The class name.

getClassCount

int getClassCount()
Gets the number of different possible values taken by the class assignments. Note that this can be greater than the actual number of classes contained in this class vector.

Returns:
The number of classes.

size

int size()
Gets the number of assignments in this class vector.

Returns:
The number of assignments.

Gets the description for this class vector.

Returns:
The description.
